title: Martina: fitness and conditioning workout program
brief_description: During 1981 Martina Navratilova commenced a training regimen spurred on by a fourth place computer ranking and many defeats. The workout is designed to improve speed strength, balance agility, and cardiovascular fitness. The video shows step-by-step just how Martina achieved top physical condition, and how others can achieve it too.
